name: Aadinath
meaning: supreme ruler of the universe, the first god

name: Abhayaprada
meaning: bestower of safety, another name for vishnu

name: Abhimanyu
meaning: Arjuna’s son, heroic, with self respect

name: Abhinanda

name: Abhishek

name: Ankush
meaning: An instrument used for guiding elephants

name: Anupama

name: Arijit
meaning: conquering enemies, son of Krishna and Subhadra

name: Ashok

name: Ashutosh

name: Aatmajyoti
meaning: Inner light, Light of the soul

name: Balbir
meaning: Strong and Brave or Mighty Warrior.

name: Baldev
meaning: Bal part signifies strength, power, and might. Dev part signifies god/lord, diety. Therefore, Baldev represents the concept of a powerful deity, embodying strength and divine power.

name: Bansilal
meaning: Beloved of Flute. Another name of Lord Krishna.

name: Barun
meaning: the god of the sky, rain, and the celestial ocean. It signifies qualities like lord of the sea, god of rain, or celestial.

name: Badrinath
meaning: Lord of mount badri. Another name of Lord Bishnu. Name badrinath is also associated with Badrinath temple.

name: Balkrishna
meaning: Balkrishna signifies young krishna. It also represents young jewel.

name: Basant
meaning: Season of Spring, One who bestows wishes,

name: Barsha
meaning: Symbolize renewal, nourishment, and growth. It also represents blessings from the heavens or a fresh start.

name: Babita
meaning: Signify a joyful and lively personality, like someone who spreads happiness.

name: BabuRam
meaning: Respected gentleman devoted to Lord Ram. Can also be interpreted as noble and virtuous person.

name: Baleshwar
meaning: Lord of strength; another name for Lord Shiva.

name: Balchandra
meaning: The young moon; symbol of youth and beauty.

name: Balbhadra
meaning: Another name of Balaram; symbol of great strength. It is also associated with Balarama, the elder brother of Lord Krishna in Hindu mythology.

name: Basundhara
meaning: The one who sustains life. It is alsoassociated with stability and nurturing.

name: Bala Nandini
meaning: Bala means child while Nandini means delightful, bringer of joy. So BalaNandini means a girl who can bring joy and happiness.

name: Balika
meaning: Young girl who has innocent face. Also associated with symbol of youthfulness.

name: Bandhana
meaning: It is associated with worship, salutation or bond.

name: Bashika
meaning: A little girl who have good behaviour with cheerful expression in her face.

name: Balendra
meaning: Lord of Light. One who is strong and powerful. Specially associated with Lord Krishna.

name: Balendra
meaning: Lord of Light. One who is strong and powerful. Specially associated with Lord Krishna.

name: Bageshwari
meaning: Another name for Goddess Saraswati, revered as the goddess of wisdom, knowledge, and creative expression. Bageshwari is also the name of a raag (melodic framework) associated with devotion and tranquility.

name: Barkha
meaning: Barkha name symbolize life, renewal, and blessings from nature. It also represents joy, freshness, and the arrival of prosperity.

name: Bashmita
meaning: A sweet-natured person who lives in harmony with others.

name: Bavisha
meaning: Symbolizes hope, new beginnings, and a bright destiny. Bavisha name represents someone forward-looking, optimistic, and visionary.

name: Banshika
meaning: A girl who is graceful, artistic, and charming, just like the enchanting sound of the flute.

name: Baylee
meaning: Bailiff, or means gift from God

name: Balvini
meaning: One who possesses strength. The name conveys qualities of courage, resilience, and empowerment.

name: Baani
meaning: Speech or Voice. Baani name represents the power of expression and communication. It is also associated with name of Goddess Saraswati, the goddess of knowledge, music, and wisdom

name: Yojana
meaning: A girl who is wise, goal-oriented, and capable of making well-planned decisions.

name: Yojan
meaning: Someone who is thoughtful, strategic, and capable of planning or organizing things well. It carries a sense of purpose, vision, and direction.

name: Yochana

name: Yogeshwari
meaning: Goddess of Yoga or Supreme Goddess of Spiritual Power.

name: Yogini

name: Yogita

name: Yogiraj
meaning: Yogiraj is associated with Lord Shiva.

name: Younis

name: Yogesh

meaning: Lord of the world (variant of Bhavesh)

name: Lalchand

name: Lalit Kishore

name: Laasya

name: Lavani
meaning: Grace or Beautiful. Lavani name represents a girl with charm, artistic talent, and a vibrant personality.

name: Lavina
meaning: Lavina name is linked wit linked with beauty, grace, and charm. It also symbolize sense of sophistication, elegance, and timeless beauty.

name: Lakshita
meaning: Lakshita name reflects success and grace. It also symbolizes focus, ambition, and recognition for achievements.

name: Laharika

name: Lalima

name: Lalita
meaning: Lalita name often used for Goddess Parvati and Radha, representing elegance, divine beauty, and tenderness.

name: Lalisha

name: Lalina

name: Lavanya
